message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you, valued at $1200000. I am offering this unique item to you at a special price of $1150000. This exceptional offer is designed to ensure that you can secure this valuable asset while still benefiting from a significant discount compared to its true worth. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.
